Self-cleaning feature: Incorporate a self-cleaning feature that uses UV light to sanitize the washing machine interior, reducing the need for manual cleaning and extending the lifespan of the machine.

Smart connectivity: Add smart connectivity to the washing machine, allowing users to control it remotely through a mobile app, monitor the washing cycle, and receive notifications when the cycle is complete.
Compact design: Design a washing machine with a compact, space-saving design that can be easily integrated into small living spaces or apartments.
Multi-functional: Create a washing machine that can perform multiple functions, such as drying, ironing, and stain removal, all in one appliance.
Eco-friendly materials: Use eco-friendly materials in the construction of the washing machine, such as recycled plastics or biodegradable components, to reduce its environmental impact.
